name: The Deep Brew
description:
THE DEEP BREW

Somewhere deep in the ocean, the sweet smell of seaweed latte lingers amid the depths. Your day takes a sudden turn, as along the coffee new thoughts start brewing as well — all thanks to the mysterious customer who challenges not only your skills as a barista, but also the duality of customer service itself.

A game made for the Global Game Jam 2022 at the FGJ Aalto Game site!

MADE BY

Camilla Pentti

Olga Tasanko

Magu

Vili Saarenpää

Virpi Väinölä

INSTRUCTIONS

Extract the .zip file.

Double click THE DEEP BREW.html to open the game in your browser.

Enable autoplay from your browser settings to enjoy music.
